00322                 int searchNgetInfoFromJosaEomiTrie( const char* str, SearchJEInfo& sjei, int len = 0 )
00323                 {
00324                         WK_DaTrie_Node trieNode;
00325 
00326                         if( len == 0 ) len = (int)strlen( str );
00327 
00328                         sjei.pos = 0;
00329 
00330                         int i;
00331 
00332                         for( i = 0; i < len; i++ )
00333                         {
00334                                 if( _josaEomiTrie.findNode( str[i], trieNode ) )
00335                                 {
00336                                         if( trieNode.mpData )
00337                                         {
00338                                                 sjei.pos  = i + 1;
00339                                                 sjei.jeti = _josaEomiInfoPoolList[ trieNode.getData() ];
00340                                         }
00341                                 }
00342                                 else
00343                                 {
00344                                         return sjei.pos;
00345                                 }
00346                         }
00347 
00348                         return sjei.pos;
00349                 }

00360                 {
00361                         JEInfo jei;

00365                         case hlL:
00366                                 if( sjei.jeti.poshlL < 0 ) return jei;

00428                 JEInfo getJEInfo( unsigned char coda )
00429                 {
00430                         JEInfo jei;
00431 
00432                         int pos = 3 ;
00433 
00434                         switch( coda )
00435                         {
00436                         case hlN: pos--;
00437                         case hlL: pos--;
00438                         case hlM: pos--;
00439                                 int idx;
00440 
00441                                 switch( pos )
00442                                 {
00443                                 case 0:
00444                                         idx = _onsetEomiInfoPoolList[pos].poshlN;
00445                                         break;
00446                                 case 1:
00447                                         idx = _onsetEomiInfoPoolList[pos].poshlL;
00448                                         break;
00449                                 case 2:
00450                                         idx = _onsetEomiInfoPoolList[pos].poshlM;
00451                                         break;
00452                                 default:
00453                                         return jei;
00454                                 }
00455 
00456                                 jei.pstr = &_jeBuffer.getBufferPtr()[ _jeBuffer.getIndexesPtr()[ idx ] ];
00457                                 jei.tag  = _jeBuffer.getTagsPtr()[ idx ];
00458                                 jei.info = _jeBuffer.getInfosPtr()[ idx ];
00459                                 jei.coda = _jeBuffer.getCodasPtr()[ idx ];
00460 
00461                                 return jei;
00462 
00463                         default:
00464                                 return jei;
00465                         }
00466                 }

00495                 int searchNgetInfoFromMainTrie( const char* str, ListEx<SearchInfo>& resultList, int len = 0, int spos = 0, bool isNNgNNp = false, bool hasOne = true, bool isLongest = false )
00496                 {
00497                         WK_DaTrie_Node trieNode;
00498 
00499                         if( len == 0 ) len = (int)strlen( str );
00500 
00501                         SearchInfo prevSi;
00502 
00503                         int i;
00504 
00505                         for( i = spos; (i < len) && (str[i] != 0); i++ )
00506                         {
00507                                 if( _mainTrie.findNode( str[i], trieNode ) )
00508                                 {
00509                                         if( trieNode.mpData )
00510                                         {
00511                                                 if( isNNgNNp == true )
00512                                                 {
00513                                                         if( !((_mainInfoPoolList[ trieNode.getData() ].tag & NNg) || (_mainInfoPoolList[ trieNode.getData() ].tag & NNp)
00514                                                                 || (_mainInfoPoolList[ trieNode.getData() ].tag & NNi) || (_mainInfoPoolList[ trieNode.getData() ].tag & Np)
00515                                                                 || (_mainInfoPoolList[ trieNode.getData() ].tag & NNu)) )
00516                                                         {
00517                                                                 continue;
00518                                                         }
00519                                                 }
00520 
00521                                                 if( hasOne == false )
00522                                                 {
00523                                                         if( (i+1 - spos) <= 2 ) continue;
00524                                                 }
00525 
00526                                                 SearchInfo si;
00527 
00528                                                 si.posStart = spos;
00529                                                 si.pos      = i + 1;
00530                                                 si.mti      = _mainInfoPoolList[ trieNode.getData() ];
00531 
00532                                                 if( si.mti.posNNB >= 0 )
00533                                                 {
00534                                                         si.pinfoNNB = (char*)(_mainBuffer.getBufferPtr() + si.mti.posNNB );
00535                                                 }
00536 
00537                                                 if( si.mti.posNNP >= 0 )
00538                                                 {
00539                                                         si.pinfoNNP = (char*)(_mainBuffer.getBufferPtr() + si.mti.posNNP );
00540                                                 }
00541 
00542                                                 if( si.mti.posNNU >= 0 )
00543                                                 {
00544                                                         si.pinfoNNU = (char*)(_mainBuffer.getBufferPtr() + si.mti.posNNU );
00545                                                 }
00546 
00547                                                 if( isLongest == true )
00548                                                 {
00549                                                         prevSi = si;
00550                                                 }
00551                                                 else
00552                                                 {
00553                                                         resultList.addTuple( si );
00554                                                 }
00555                                         }
00556                                 }
00557                                 else
00558                                 {
00559                                         if( (isLongest == true) && (prevSi.pos > 0) )
00560                                         {
00561                                                 resultList.addTuple( prevSi );
00562                                         }
00563 
00564                                         return (int)resultList.size();
00565                                 }
00566                         }
00567 
00568                         if( (isLongest == true) && (prevSi.pos > 0) )
00569                         {
00570                                 resultList.addTuple( prevSi );
00571                         }
00572 
00573                         return (int)resultList.size();
00574                 }

00587                 int searchNgetInfoFromMainTrie( const char* str, SearchInfo& si, int len )
00588                 {
00589                         WK_DaTrie_Node trieNode;
00590 
00591                         if( len == 0 ) len = (int)strlen( str );
00592 
00593                         int i;
00594 
00595                         memset( &si, 0x0, sizeof( SearchInfo ) );
00596 
00597                         for( i = 0; (i < len) && (str[i] != 0); i++ )
00598                         {
00599                                 if( !(_mainTrie.findNode( str[i], trieNode )) ) return 0;
00600                         }
00601 
00602                         if( trieNode.mpData )
00603                         {
00604                                 si.pos = len;
00605                                 si.mti = _mainInfoPoolList[ trieNode.getData() ];
00606 
00607                                 if( si.mti.posNNB >= 0 )
00608                                 {
00609                                         si.pinfoNNB = (char*)(_mainBuffer.getBufferPtr() + si.mti.posNNB );
00610                                 }
00611 
00612                                 if( si.mti.posNNP >= 0 )
00613                                 {
00614                                         si.pinfoNNP = (char*)(_mainBuffer.getBufferPtr() + si.mti.posNNP );
00615                                 }
00616 
00617                                 if( si.mti.posNNU >= 0 )
00618                                 {
00619                                         si.pinfoNNU = (char*)(_mainBuffer.getBufferPtr() + si.mti.posNNU );
00620                                 }
00621 
00622                                 return 1;
00623                         }
00624 
00625                         return 0;
00626                 }

00644                 int searchNgetInfoFromPreAnalTrie( const char* str, int len )
00645                 {
00646                         WK_DaTrie_Node trieNode;
00647 
00648                         if( len == 0 ) len = (int)strlen( str );
00649 
00650                         int i;
00651

00655                         }

00694                 int searchNgetInfoFromDivTrie( const char* str, DivideInfo& divInfo, int len )
00695                 {
00696                         WK_DaTrie_Node trieNode;
00697 
00698                         if( len == 0 ) len = (int)strlen( str );
00699 
00700                         int i;
00701 
00702                         memset( &divInfo, 0x0, sizeof( DivideInfo ) );
00703 
00704                         for( i = 0; (i < len) && (str[i] != 0); i++ )
00705                         {
00706                                 if( !(_divTrie.findNode( str[i], trieNode )) ) return 0;
00707                         }

00709                         if( trieNode.mpData )
00710                         {
00711                                 divInfo = _divideInfos[ trieNode.getData() ];

00714                         }
